name: Chasing Tales: Mouglon the Watchful
requirement: Acquire a Dragonsblood mace and perform tasks to re-create Mouglon's legend.

bits.text: Acquire the tome entry Chasing Tales: Mouglon the Watchful.
Acquire the heroic spirit of Mouglon: deed #1.
Acquire the heroic spirit of Mouglon: deed #2.
Acquire the heroic spirit of Mouglon: deed #3.
Meet with the spirit of Mouglon at a heroic font.
